description: Redevelopment to provide a part-four, part-five storey building comprising a Children's Day Nursery (Use Class E(f)) of 362 sq.m (GIA) at ground floor level, 65 residential dwellings (Use Class C3) on ground to fourth floors, and roof level plant. Creation of new play space, landscaping, cycle parking, access and electric substation; in addition to associated on-street car parking. (revised description, drawings and documentation)
